website_summaries.verdict: Ward off deer and other garden invaders AND give your lawn a bit of water at the same time. Motion-activated device scares away animals with a strong water blast and accompanying clicking sound.
pros: A humane way to deter deer and other animals
Safe yet powerful motion-activated water jet
Owners report that it works, and they are happy it doesn't harm animals
cons: If you forget to turn off the water source before walking into the area, YOU get sprayed
Animals might become accustomed to the device and ignore it

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brand of motion sensor sprinkler to replace a broken one of a different brand. The battery was located in much more accessible location in the front. The construction is better also, because it has a metal stake and is higher off the ground. Its working fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: PERFORMS AS ADVERSTISED
customer_reviews.text: After reading some less than positive reviews of this product, I was happy to learn that the Hoont Cobra Jett Blaster performs exactly as represented. The jet spray is adjustable and the sensor is adjustable and sensitive. More importantly, the product removed some unwanted guests around my more sensitive planting areas. When I went back and reviewed the unfavorable reviews, it was clear that the people that complained about the product simply did not understand how to assemble and or use it. I have ordered a second Blaster for a friend who has pests in their garden as well.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Lander

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor jet spray deterrant
customer_reviews.text: Love this. We have some stray animals in the neighborhood that get into out trash. We hooked this up right here the trash can and it has helped. It's a great product that does the trick but does not hurt unwanted animals.
customer_reviews.author: Kate's

customer_reviews.title: broke after about a week
customer_reviews.text: It was great when it worked. It stopped working after about a week. The red light would pick up movement but the device wouldn't spray. It seemed like something mechanical broke internally and the sprayer wasn't being activated. I don't think the issue was electrical. I am going to order a second unit to see if this functions better. I am returning this unit. Hopefully it lasts since my rude, inconsiderate neighbor intentionally lets her dogs out to pee all over one area of my yard and it's killing my grass (yes, I have asked her to stop but she's not mentally stable). This seems to be my last ditch option before I call animal control or the police.
customer_reviews.author: Abe Froman

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hounds
customer_reviews.text: what an awesome product. Our neighbors dogs have dug under our fence, and often invite themselves over to play with our dogs, or with us. they are adorable, and we love them very much. however, our dogs have learned to leave our chickens alone. the neighbors dogs have not, and the other day another neighbor stopped one of them when it had our chicken in it's mouth. (the chicken is OK). this has been wonderful means of keeping the nighbors dogs in their own yard, and keeping our chickens safe, and most importantly, no animals are being injured in the process. Happy chickens, Happy hounds, happy neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: The range is also very impressive-which is both good and bad depending on the size of the area ...
customer_reviews.text: These work as advertised and the directions are very clear and concise. The only cautionary note is that there is no way to adjust range or sensitivity of the motion sensor...and is my garden that means that wind blowing a bush will set it off fairly often. The range is also very impressive-which is both good and bad depending on the size of the area you are trying to repel animals from. The compromise is connecting the hose that runs to these units to a timer so that it only sprays water at night when wind is less likely to be an issue and people walking thru the garden is less likely too...
customer_reviews.author: Snack King

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month.
customer_reviews.text: The first one of these I bought in February, 2017, is still working. However, the one I bought 3 months ago (May, 2017) only worked for a month or two and now doesn't work. Expensive for only 30-60 days worth of product. When we first noticed it wasn't going off, we tested/changed batteries 3 times. It would activate once when we locked the batteries in place and then, nothing. Of course it worked for the first 30 days of warranty, now I don't have the option to send it back so there's $40 down the toilet. I can't recommend buying this product on the off chance you'll get one that keeps working, it's too much money for that.
customer_reviews.author: PatG

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Effective
customer_reviews.text: I have a major issue with rabbits absolutely destroying my lawn. Ived tried human traps (cages for later release), a low powered BB gun to scar them, letting my dog run them off and finally shooting with a high powered pellet rifle...nothing worked. This motion activated sprinkler, while not 100 percent effective, seems to be the best solution. The rabbits trip the motion sensor and the sprinkler sprays for a determined (you adjust the time) time thereby spraying the rabbits and scaring them off. As I said, it is not 100 percent, but it is mostly effective.
customer_reviews.author: Carson

customer_reviews.title: It a roll of the Dice!
customer_reviews.text: Two time loser! First one the sensor didn't work. Second replacement same results! Have another brand in service, so it's not the installer! Very disappointing. Plus, I was not given the option of an UPS package pickup on the replacement. Have to make a 12 mile drive to return the faulty item. Obviously, I am not happy with the product, or the customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Claus

customer_reviews.title: Needs a blindfold.
customer_reviews.text: Annoying that the sensor can not be turned off. Activates even on the 0 (zero) setting. To deactivate must take out batteries, or blindfold the sensor. Wind caused movement will activate. Have used for a week attempting to keep birds out of raspberries. Wind activation seems to scare off birds, don't think birds themselves activate. Construction is decent. These devices will keep deer out of your vegetable garden. So far I prefer the Yardeen that is less expensive, has a solar charger, activates by infared, not motion.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara K

customer_reviews.title: I have corn!
customer_reviews.text: This sucker actually works. Local raccoons had decided my garden was their new restaurant, they were in the corn nightly and looking at my cantaloupes as next. Turned this on in the garden and I managed to pick all of my cantaloupes. Moved it to another corn patch (I planted in succession for multiple pickings) I am actually getting corn this time, (A first in 2 years!!) My only complaint is you have to remember to turn it off during the day time or it eats batteries. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Blind Cat Rescue

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk! Leaks from multiple connections. Photo cell ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk! Leaks from multiple connections. Photo cell sticks open causing exorbitant loss of water. Go with the Scarecrow. I've had one for 3 years without a glitch. That's what happens when you try to save a buck!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Not working.... seems to be refurbished ...
customer_reviews.text: Not working. ...seems to be refurbished. Return window has closed. ...now I'm stuck with this junk. ..Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Legend

customer_reviews.title: This wouldn't have been so bad had the spray top not fallen off at some ...
customer_reviews.text: This product destroyed my garden. The leaks that could only be fixed by adding gaskets should have been my first clue. As noted by other reviewers, the product goes into a mode where it doe not stop spraying: sprays for few seconds, pauses, repeats ad infinitum. This wouldn't have been so bad had the spray top not fallen off at some point during the night, leaving water to pour out in place all night long. An area of over 100sqft is so badly saturated that I cannot walk on it. A huge portion of my garden is ruined, not to mention the impact that the incessant must have had on my well pump. AVOID THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: WildwoodKanes

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: It is the second time I have bought this product. The first one broke within a few months The second one started leaking within a few days and it's been a month and now it's " off" mechanism is broken ... so if it starts it won't stop. For the price they charge wish the product was more sturdy
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Not enough batteries in the world...
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for concept, but I can only give 2 for execution. This thing would go off randomly, at the wind, and would go through batteries almost every week. If you have time to continually monitor the product to see if the batteries are dead, you may be satisfied. But, it really didn't help to keep the critters out of our garden since I didn't have time or patience to replace the batteries so often.
customer_reviews.author: Jill M.

customer_reviews.title: it leaked like a SIEVE
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of junk!! This thing only worked very briefly when the stars aligned, the wind stopped and it was set perfectly in the ground. Otherwise, it leaked like a SIEVE. God help you if the wind was blowing because it went off relentlessly at night and doubled our water bill. and that was at a low sensitivity setting. PIECE OF JUNK
customer_reviews.author: Mike Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Works well, and is cheaper than the other brand ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, and is cheaper than the other brand of units I have. One minor complaint, I set it to 0 (lowest setting) and went to move it, and it triggered and sprayed me. On my other units, 0 is off, and will not trigger. Is very sensitive- I have it set to 1, and it can still pick me up walking 20' away. Might be a problem if you can't aim it away from people areas. Can be false-triggered by sunlight on building windows and siding, even at the 2-3 settings.
customer_reviews.author: Zephrant

customer_reviews.title: Good deer deterrent in flower beds
customer_reviews.text: Quick easy set up, seems to work great to keep deer away from rose garden. Sensor is very sensitive and will activate with wind blowing leaves during the day. Sensitivity does not seem to be adjustable with external know. I would still recommend as good solution for deer deterrent in flower beds.
customer_reviews.author: Donald McCulley

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome and keeps those neighbors dogs off my grass. I accidentally left it on, and shot my wife's butt with water, then she turned around to scream and it shot her left ear and blew off her diamond stud ear ring that we got at the swap meet We still can find it. So watch out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: definitely non-commercial
customer_reviews.text: dislikes? batteries don't last very long. it's too leaky to leave somewhere that people can't regularly check up on it. i suppose for a homeowner, it's ok. it's cheap quality and not what i was hoping for. it's hard to get the setting just right for geese. i always had to keep all applicable washers perfect to avoid leak catastrophes.
customer_reviews.author: ehdy

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but If you have a bird problem
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but If you have a bird problem, the Cobra spray jet I received did not work. Birds came down on my Koi pond and the thing "Never" turned on. I adjusted the sensitivity knob - re-positioned it and nothing. Birds flew right in front of it - jumping around on the rocks everything.. But if I walk by it will hit me from 30 feet away.. I don't understand. Return Special!!! And there's a "T" splitter where the garden hose connects to and it uses a plastic cap on one of the sides I guess if you have a smaller size hose and water on mine leaked at that cap.. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 of them. One wouldn't work at ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of them. One wouldn't work at all-defective motion sensor or something. The other would go off for no reason on every setting level, but if I threw a stick in front of it on level 9 (most sensitive) it wouldn't go off. Not very effective for keeping birds off of my trees or keeping the water bill low. Returning them both.
customer_reviews.author: p ditty

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: Used to deter a neighbor cat that was visiting almost every night upsetting our cats, and waking us up. It works great! Our security cameras have also caught it chasing away a couple of raccoons from our bird feeders, and one startled aunt that forgot we told her it was there. LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Works ok, can't completely depend on it
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, but is really sensitive which drains the batteries quickly. You can set the sensitivity somewhat, but I haven't been able to perfect it. An elk came through and cleared out my garden while I hadn't realized the batteries were dead after only a week 😕
customer_reviews.author: Klnelson00

customer_reviews.title: Best that I have tried
customer_reviews.text: It was a project that ended great.I had a problem with birds on the Large boat dock and it has been a big mess for a while so I took the chance and put a ball valve at the walk way to the dock and placed (7) of these Cobra Jets around the area (and these do work better than the pricey ones) I have tried a few and if your in the sun put some UV spray on them they will last longer.But anyway I have never had a cleaner dock and I can shut all of them down when reach the front of the dock and turn that valve.I even bought (8) spares I like them so well.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Keeps them out at night
customer_reviews.text: Cats....wild cats doing their business in the gardens at night. Absolutely disgusting it makes me gag, every time I had to remove their sh**. My terrier keeps them away in the day, and this Hoont sprinkler just plain old works. It is easy to assemble and adjust and keeps them out at night.
customer_reviews.author: Schmicter

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Jet blaster is difficult to focus on the area where you want it to focus and in general leaks a lot when placed onto a garden hose. Save your money as we couldn't get ours to work correctly.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jean Pickus

customer_reviews.title: Only problem we are having is it goes through batteries like crazy!
customer_reviews.text: This does deter animals and people. Only problem we are having is it goes through batteries like crazy!
customer_reviews.author: Carol J. Boucher

customer_reviews.title: This works very good for skunks and deer but then my chocolate lab ...
customer_reviews.text: This works very good for skunks and deer but then my chocolate lab found it I guess you could say it worked good for her too
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Jojo

customer_reviews.title: The design department messed this otherwise good working product so badly
customer_reviews.text: It could be 5 stars... but... The water kicks out in way to HIGH... INSTEAd OF shooting at animals!!! I'm returning mine. The design department messed this otherwise good working product so badly ;(... Some answers suggest to tilt pole... but that does making motion sensor useless pointing it down accordingly... I'd rather pay twice for different product, than be happy for price and for 20% of effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: PreferredCustomer

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKS!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE ONLY THING THAT KEEP DEER FROM EATING ALL MY BEAUTIFUL FLOWERS, I LIVE IN A COMMUNITY WHERE WE CANNOT HAVE FENCING, SO I BOUGHT TWO OF THESE, ONE FOR THE FRONT AND ONE FOR THE BACK,. NICE PART IS IT WATERS THE GARDENS FOR ME.
customer_reviews.author: bulldog

customer_reviews.title: These work great. I purchased to keep a skunk a way ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I purchased to keep a skunk a way from our yard (dog got skunked) The plastic extension that makes the sprinkler taller can easily break, however, the sprinkler can be attached directly to the metal stake, and you end up with a slightly shorter sprinkler, and it still works very well. There is no on and off switch. As long a the batteries are in, the motion detector detects and just clicks if the water is not on.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: I am at this particular time pleased with my Hoont Cobra Powerful Jet Spray
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2rd Hoont Cobra Powerful Jet Spray I've had the first one when activated ever so often it would spray without any motion. This particular model works ( sprays) only when there is motion. At this time it seems to be working as it should and it keeps the cats out of my flower beds ( mulch). I am at this particular time pleased with my Hoont Cobra Powerful Jet Spray. I have already recommended it to my family and friends. .
customer_reviews.author: Norvell J.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We really needed this to work as we wanted a humane way to be rid of a summer garden pest. The product arrived fast, well packaged and operated easily for a couple weeks. As our garden water runs on timers we didn't notice the ground was being drenched right away. Water was running from the body of the unit from some internal defect. If this was maybe a $20 item I might not be as disappointed but I expected a $50 purchase to last a few years instead of a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would avoid purchasing this product
customer_reviews.text: Would avoid purchasing this product. Here are my reasons: 1) Expensive 2) leaks water around the connections 3) when activated the water drops down in front of the sensor to make it activate again and again and again 4) the sprayer shoots high - over the target when it is activated. 5) if the deer aren't spooked from the first spray they can stand there eating your prize vegetation without getting sprayed again because there isn't enough movement to activate the sprayer again. Solution - Finally had to put up a fence and that did the trick. Unfortunately now have this expensive sprinkler and no use for it.
customer_reviews.author: ryan yarwood

customer_reviews.title: Wet Thief!!! Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: We had a problem with a thief that would like to go around and make sure you locked your car at night. I purchased this to give him quite the scare when he comes into my driveway. This teamed with a timer on the water hose has worked out nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Very effective!
customer_reviews.text: Finally something really works to keep deer from our young trees. Effective yet humane. What a fabulous idea! We set two of these at different sections of our yard about two months ago and are very pleased so far. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Watermark

customer_reviews.title: The area where it sprays is pretty clean now
customer_reviews.text: The area where it sprays is pretty clean now. However, the cats that mess in our yard have figured out that there are certain corners where the spay does not cover, and they still mess there.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Morris

customer_reviews.title: Easy trade off to keep the squirrels from feasting in ...
customer_reviews.text: This has proven to work quite well at keeping the squirrels away that were eating my tomatoes. Only downfall I see is, it seems to go off frequently if it's windy out. Easy trade off to keep the squirrels from feasting in my garden. Thanks 👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Brian T.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped my dog from digging around the house, also ...
customer_reviews.text: Stopped my dog from digging around the house, also entertaining when someone walks by and it scares the P out of em...
customer_reviews.author: coy

customer_reviews.title: This device works about as well as you could expect ...
customer_reviews.text: This device works about as well as you could expect a motion-sensing, water-spraying contraption to work. Although I never saw it scare away a deer, it certainly worked on the family dog. Rabbits were another story, however. Because they are so small and can hide behind foliage, they don't reliably trip the sensor. Also, on windy/rainy days the sensor was going off all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Dave K.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. A little bulky and sprays kind of high for small animals but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: John F

customer_reviews.title: It works, But too Sensitive
customer_reviews.text: This thing works and it scares the stray cats away. Problem is, it's too Sensitive. On a windy day, it will go off every minute. Not sure if it's the trees or the shadows of the trees that cause it to go off? So, it tends to waste a lot of water. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this few days ago & returned it after a day use because it activates about every 2 minutes when setting is full even without anything moving in front of the sensor. There is no other setting to stop this. I wasted a lot of water the whole night..
customer_reviews.author: TGMSR

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing and have saved my plants from my dogs and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and have saved my plants from my dogs and cats. I unhooked the spring so it didn't act like an impact sprinkler and set it to minimum so it just mists a smaller area (4'x4' raised bed). I will most likely buy a few more to get all of my plants protected.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S. Sneed

customer_reviews.title: sprays water good, but bit don't work on birds
customer_reviews.text: comes on sometimes for no reason, sprays water good , but bit don't work on birds, I have chickens, and don't work no matter where you set the motion sensor, Made in China It's not worth the money, It works on people good , Ha, Ha,
customer_reviews.author: clayton cambra

customer_reviews.title: Sensitivity dial more like an on off switch
customer_reviews.text: Shoots off water to a person walking by also. So, you'll spray the critters and yourself too. I suppose that could work in some locations. Sensitivity dial more like an on off switch. Maybe I'll put it back into action to keep the pesky stray cats the neighbor can't resist feeding ... out of backyard.
customer_reviews.author: po'dpridrvr

customer_reviews.title: Good range for the sensor
customer_reviews.text: Product works as described. very sensitive infrared sensor. Good range for the sensor. Was able to cover my front lawn. Unit does not have an on/off button and also does not include a night/day mode. These would make it a bit nicer so you dont have to turn the hose off each morning and back on each night.
customer_reviews.author: Catch22

customer_reviews.title: Good deterrent
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with my cats getting in my flower bed. I bought a electronic deterrent from Amazon to try and solve my problem. I did not deter them at all returned it and got this works great keeps them out and added benefit of waters the plants some. ower
customer_reviews.author: DSRAB

customer_reviews.title: Keeps unwanted guess away!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was having problems with my neighbor letting his dog crap in my yard and this solved the problem. The HOA wasn't doing anything about the problem so I took matters into my own hands and it worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: D. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Useless product.
customer_reviews.text: The product did not work. I put the batteries in and when I turne it on the top came off , as if it was too much pressure. I tuned the hose with as little water as possible and the spray jet still was coming off. Useless product.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Johannson

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: 2 days after the return period ran out it stopped working even with fresh batteries. Take the batteries out and it runs continuously. I guess I have a very expensive sprinkler. These are junk.
customer_reviews.author: LCPiet

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work. At least, not the one I received. I have tried 3 different sets of brand new batteries, set up/taken apart multiple times EXACTLY as the instructions said and nothing happens. Must be a dud. There's no contact listed for getting another one. Very displeased since I spent good money on this waste as deer are continuing to eat my foliage!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Root

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it works great once you get it situated properly
customer_reviews.text: Would give 4-5 stars if it weren't for the leaks at the base of unit. Other than that it works great once you get it situated properly. Keeps cats/critters away.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory J. Gaines Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. Actually
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Actually, it's a pretty sensitive sensor. For my use case, I should have gone with a model that takes advantage of a storage tank. I hate leaving the hose strewn all over the yard to get to this thing. Has a pretty good throw, as well.
customer_reviews.author: CHopwd

customer_reviews.title: A saviour for any yard infested with stray cats or squirrels
customer_reviews.text: This has been the saviour of my yard. Keeps stray cats and squirrels off my lawn like magic. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Peter MacRobert

customer_reviews.title: The plastic post that connects to the metal spike snapped ...
customer_reviews.text: The plastic post that connects to the metal spike snapped off after 2-weeks of use. I had to repair the broken part & now works. I would have given it a 5-star, but having it break so soon was a bit discouraging.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tanaka

customer_reviews.title: Ours leaks...
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great, and it has seemed to discourage squirrels from digging in our raised garden, but in trade since day 1 of setting it up, we've dealt with it leaking constantly as it waits. If I turn down the water, it leaks less, but then it doesn't have the power to shoot when the motion sensor goes off. Now our lawn is muddy and I don't want to see our water bill this month. Did we just get a faulty one or are they all like this?
customer_reviews.author: The Kid Should See This

customer_reviews.title: NOT ANYMORE !
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this item. My dog used to play on top of my car. She played with her toys on top of my car. She yanked a wiper blade. NOT ANYMORE. She doesn't get close to the car.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Drip, spray, drip, spray, repeat.
customer_reviews.text: The sprayer kept dripping after spraying, which would drip over the motion sensor and set off more spraying... and more dripping... just a constant cycle. Can't tell if it scared the cats but definitely soaked my yard/garden... I adjusted the "sensitivity" a bunch and still no luck. Was so excited to get the cats out of my garden but ended up being bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He loved it. He was so excited he set it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a gift. He loved it. He was so excited he set it right up. It worked great!! He even coaxed the dog towards it. A great product!!
customer_reviews.author: LEE ANN

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I like this much better than the 2 Scarecrow sprinklers I have. Easy to setup and it has a steel spike instead of the plastic one the Scarecrows have.
customer_reviews.author: Alan T.

customer_reviews.title: Need something to hold the water instead of upping my waterbill.
customer_reviews.text: After owning this product I must say it has been a letdown. There is not a valve to hold water while your line isn't running. Also, it feels cheap and not too sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Joseph

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this to keep a bear away from my ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to keep a bear away from my bird feeder, but I do not know if the bear has visited or not! I have a maple tree with very full branches which on a windy day sets off the motion sensor. Because of that, I have the sensitivity turned down. A bear had taken the bird feeder pole down to the ground before I ordered the Hoont Cobra Water Jet Blaster. The redwood bird feeder is mounted on a steel pole, and is still standing, so that is all I ask!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Motion Sprinkler works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Cats hate this sprinkler, my garden loves it. Able to direct the eye and water in different directions. Comes on when motion is detected and about a cup of water is sprayed for about 2-3 seconds
customer_reviews.author: Spiderman

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: Kind of cheaply made. Arrived DOA and I returned it and bought a better brand. The difference in build quality between this and a unit of a different brand, that costs 15 dollars more, is pretty significant.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Goes through batteries like crazy. Other than that does what it claims
customer_reviews.text: Goes through batteries like crazy. Other than that does what it claims. We bought it to protect raised bed. It worked on the deer but the turkeys ignored it completely.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hesse

customer_reviews.title: Blue Heron hates it! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Blue Heron hates it, I love it! Perfect for backyard Koi pond that the Blue Heron was using for his personal Sushi Bar. Doesn't seem to affect my bird feeders, they are still coming around but it most definitely scares the heron out of that fish killer
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth T Augustine

customer_reviews.title: It does the job well just as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It did scare the dear out of our yard. I already bought a second unit to protect a different section of out front yard.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great solution to my Critter issue!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have a major rabbit and groundhog issue with my garden. This solved my issues with them eating my whole garden. Works well with my resident bear too, lol. And it humane!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Aweful
customer_reviews.text: It goes off at any little breeze . Also connections are not tight and it leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sensitive but adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Does the trick, a little flimsy and can come apart(not break) when adjusting. Has protected plants well. Pretty sensitive but adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: John & family

customer_reviews.title: wild turkey chaser
customer_reviews.text: Turkeys eating my tomato blossoms then the leaves. This unit spayed them three times and they never returned. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Rockbotm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to keep the feral cats out of my vegetable garden. It definitely worked.
customer_reviews.author: habanero69er

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This product works awesome!! Works better than advertised!!! Got rid of egret problem in a week. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: kurt tillery

customer_reviews.title: It works as intended, but can be a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: It works as intended, but can be a bit sensative. Was used to keep a cat out of my garden. Just remember if you shut it off the animal can come back. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Reliable. Batteries last a long time. Very sensitive motion detection. Deer don't want to come back.
customer_reviews.author: Practicle1

customer_reviews.title: Yes this actually works !!! WINNER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing that really works to keep ducks out of your pool! Don't buy or waste money on other stuff! This is hilarious to watch and the ducks hate it. It shipped fast and it's easy to set up! Winner winner! Thanks Hoont people!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: If it's windy the spray goes off constantly. The ...
customer_reviews.text: If it's windy the spray goes off constantly. The batteries have to be changed often. So I have to turn it off a lot of the batteries die and of course the geese still come on my property. However when everything is working it does keep the geese away.. so I am keeping them
customer_reviews.author: bswift

customer_reviews.title: I wish there was way to adjust the angle the ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was way to adjust the angle the top hooding cover dose not come far enough down
customer_reviews.author: Willie J. Stokes

customer_reviews.title: The very best thing for that neighbor who won't keep his dog ...
customer_reviews.text: The very best thing for that neighbor who won't keep his dog off your lawn. A friend suggested this and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E.

customer_reviews.title: dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Acted erratic, it would go off when the wind blew even after turning the sensor down. Ran through batteries and broke at the base where you spike it into the ground. It had great potential but in the end not well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: nothing to complain since It works. But, I was hoping the spray angle can be a slightly wider (not all the way for 360 degrees)
customer_reviews.author: D. Young

customer_reviews.title: Keeps all wildlife away.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, you can't set it for only after dark but it works great. I had no raccoons back once I put this in their path.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: leaks too much
customer_reviews.text: Leaks all over the place. Spent my return eligible time trying to get it to work. should have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: suedoe

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to adjust and maintain. Batteries are a pain ...
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to adjust and maintain. Batteries are a pain in the rear to replace and the spring on the negative sides are weak. Only worked about 2 weeks. Valve clicks but won't open enough to operate. It clicks and squirts a small dribble or two. New batteries did not solve.
customer_reviews.author: Todd D. LaRue

customer_reviews.title: Bad Jet Spray
customer_reviews.text: Had it for less than a month and it stopped working. Also, it does not spray very well. I have had two other scarecrows in past years and they were excellent and lasted for a couple years. I wouldn't buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Leaks from connections
customer_reviews.text: This is a good idea , however , the unit leaks from all connections and the sensor is hit or miss .
customer_reviews.author: montes9R

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if it didn't leak
customer_reviews.text: It would have been a fine product and seemed to detect motion well, but I could never get it to not leak out of the body of the device. Returned it and my potato plants have been ravished.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: It feels pretty cheap. However, it works outstandingly well at keeping my chickens out of the yard. It has a tendency to repeat fire when water drips down in front of the motion sensor.
customer_reviews.author: Nope

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works good. I found it hard to adjust the sensitivity, very touchy. There are times it just kicks on sometimes without being activated. It does keep the cats out of the flower bed.
customer_reviews.author: royalblue69

customer_reviews.title: Cat crap gone!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps cats away even when water off! I hate cats and love this! No more surprises in the landscaping.
customer_reviews.author: bobby

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This thing goes through batteries in a day. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Worked for what we wanted but could not leave it ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked for what we wanted but could not leave it on. It continued to auto trigger when water dripped in front of the sensor.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gaston

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the Herons from killing my Koi fish ... very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Fittings leaked and batteries ran down in two days. Returned for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Webster

customer_reviews.title: Effective Against Deer
customer_reviews.text: This sprayer works better than another we had of another brand. This one sprays a longer distance, keeping deer out of several landscaped areas at once.
customer_reviews.author: Grannie Annie

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend to others
customer_reviews.text: Good idea but the quality of this product is lacking. Leaks at every connection and sensor is inconsistent.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works to help keep the deer from eating our front yard plants!
customer_reviews.author: eureka70

product_meta.title: Hoont Cobra Powerful Outdoor Water Jet Blaster Animal Pest Repeller, Motion Activated, Expels Cats, Dogs, Squirrels, Birds, Deer, Etc. Out of Your Property (Upgraded Version)
product_meta.description: The Hoont cobra water jet blaster animal repeller - motion activated the Hoont cobra water jet blaster animal deterrent drives away unwanted "visitors" to your garden or property with a harmless jet of water. When the built-in sensor detects movement within a range of up to 30 feet, the jet of water is activated for approximately 5 seconds. Animals are frightened by this jet of water and immediately leave the monitored area, and learn to avoid this area in the future. Also, the clicking noise of the distribution valve that sounds when the jet of water is activated frightens the animals and helps to drive them away. The jet of water is only reactivated when movement is once again detected. This ensures high effectiveness with very low water consumption. The Hoont cobra water jet blaster animal repeller is the most humane method for keeping animals and pests out of your property. It doesn't kill or harm the animals, it just sprays them with an annoying squirt of water, thus forcing them to leave the area. With no messy traps, chemicals or pesticides, it's absolutely safe for you, your kids and for your pets. Repels birds, dogs, cats, squirrels, skunks, deer, wild animals, etc. Easy setup connect the hose, stick the garden stake into the ground and adjust your water spray preference. The device is ready to protect your garden and property. Package includes: Motion detector water sprayer hose connection stake owners manual. Scares away all animals, such as cats, dogs, squirrels, skunks, deer, wild animals, birds, etc. Animals are startled and quickly leave the area and will avoid the area in the future. As soon as a pest animal is detected by the motion sensor, a powerful blast of water is sprayed to scare the pest away. Product specification water spraying angle: 360° (adjustable) / monitored area: Approx. 1076 sq. Ft. / Effective during day and night. / New and improved components for optimal performance.
feature_bullets: The Hoont cobra water jet blaster animal repeller sprays a powerful yet harmless jet of water as soon as it detects an animal invading your property
Very easy to set up, Choose the area where animals are roaming, insert the unit into the ground using the provided stake and connect to a garden hose
The Hoont cobra water jet blaster animal repeller is the most humane method for keeping animals and pests out of your property
When the built-in sensor detects movement within a range of up to 30 feet, the jet of water is activated for approximately 5 seconds
Specifications - requires 2 "aa" batteries (batteries not included) / motion sensor detection range up to 30 ft. / Detection angle: Approx. 120°
